EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED FROM MULTIPLE VESSELS
WITHIN 80 MILES OF 33-00N 013-00E. VESSELS
IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 39 065 908 4527, 39 065 908 4409,
FAX: 39 06 592 2737, 39 065 908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
